projects.title: HSE specialist (m/f/d) with SIFA certification - QA/QC & construction site experience in plant construction
projects.description:
In summary, your respective tasks will make a significant contribution to quality, safety and the protection of health and the environment on the construction site. Close cooperation and coordination between QA/QC and HSE/SIFA is crucial for the successful and safe completion of construction projects. Germany-wide projects!

QA/QC (Quality Assurance / Quality Control): Quality Assurance (QA):Development and implementation of quality standards and procedures for the entire construction process. Creation...
skills: QA/QC: Requirements: Sound knowledge of building materials, standards, quality management systems; experience in inspection/testing, reporting; diligence, quality awareness, analytical thinking, communication skills; technical training with additional QM qualification advantageous. Tasks: Developing/checking quality standards, inspections, defect management, documentation, improvement. HSE: Requirements: Sound knowledge of laws/guidelines (occupational health and safety, environment); experience in risk assessment, plan preparation, instruction, accident investigation; sense of responsibility, strong communication skills, assertiveness; degree in safety engineering/environment or similar with relevant additional qualifications. Tasks: Develop/review HSE guidelines, risk assessments, safety plans, instructions, accident investigation, monitoring.

projects.title: Process Manager (m/f/d) - IT Process Landscape
projects.description: For our client, a leading industrial company based in Northern Germany, we are looking for an experienced Process Manager (m/f/d) with a strong sense for people and practicability. The aim of the project is to further develop the IT process landscape - both conceptually and in close coordination with specialist departments and stakeholders. skills: Process expertise: Several years of experience in process management, ideally with relevant certifications (e.g. BPMN, Six Sigma, Lean Management). Tool knowledge: Confident in using process management tools, especially ADONIS. People focus: A keen sense of people and the ability to engage and motivate a wide range of stakeholders. Strong communication skills: Excellent communication skills (verbal and written) to present and convey complex topics in an understandable way. Pragmatism: The willingness and ability to develop and allow pragmatic approaches to solutions alongside traditional frameworks. Analytical skills: Strong analytical thinking skills and the ability to grasp complex issues quickly. Independence: An independent, structured and results-oriented way of working. Language skills: Business fluent German language skills are mandatory.
